nodes.text: Krownest was an individual who wore Mandalorian armor and a Nite Owl helmet. After the First Order arrived on Batuu, Krownest contacted Dok-Ondar looking to buy Ezra Bridger's scout trooper helmet. After Ondar confirmed he had the helmet, Krownest transferred credits to Ondar and sent him the shipping address.

Krownest first appeared in the Star Wars: Datapad, a mobile game that allows guests in Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge to interact with the theme park. The image representing Krownest in the Datapad matches with Sabine Wren's armor and they share a name with Sabine's homeworld of Krownest, but it's unknown if they're meant to be the same character.
